Description: A powerful swing that penetrates <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Ability_WarHammer_ArmorBreaker.ArmorPenetration * 100]}%</font> of the target's armor and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ArmorBreaker.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

Adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> to Armor Breaker.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Armor Breaker inflicts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font> on the target, reducing damage absorption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_ArmorBreaker_Rend.ABSStrike * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_ArmorBreaker_Rend.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Increase Armor Breaker damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ArmBreak_DmgFullHealth.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> against targets at full health.

An overhead leaping attack that <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">crushes down</font> on enemies, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

Increases Mighty Gavel damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_Gavel_DmgUnder30pctHP.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_Gavel_DmgUnder30pctHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Increase <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stamina damage</font> done by Mighty Gavel by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_Gavel_StaminaDmg.BlockDamage * 100]}%</font>.

After a successful Mighty Gavel attack, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font>, increasing player's movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Gavel_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Gavel_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Pressing light attack during Mighty Gavel performs a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">follow up</font> attack that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_MightyGavel_upg.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

Strike the ground with your war hammer, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_WreckingBall.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">knocking down</font> your target. \n\nThis ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

On a successful hit, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font>, granting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_WreckingBall_Fortify.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> damage resistance for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_WreckingBall_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Expands the range of Wrecking Ball to a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1.5m</font> radius.

Increase armor penetration by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_LightHeavyPenetrate.ArmorPenetration * 100]}%</font> for all war hammer basic attacks.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font> on heavy attacks, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Warhammer_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

All war hammer abilities apply <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">exhaust</font>, slowing target's stamina regeneration by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.StaminaRate * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Warhammer_Pass_ExhaustOnHit.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not stack.)</font>

Adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> to war hammer heavy attacks. Also grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%</font> damage reduction while <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> is active. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Increase heavy attack damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyvsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> against targets under <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_HeavyvsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Heavy attacks that hit reduce cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">7%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_Juggernaut_CDROnHit.NumberOfTrackedHits]} reductions per attack.)</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Pass_EmpowerOnDmgTaken.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> extra damage for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Pass_EmpowerOnDmgTaken.BaseDuration]}s</font> after taking damage.

A wide swing that <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">knocks back 4m</font> and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_ClearOut.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. \n\nThis ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

Hitting a target with Clear Out grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font>, increasing damage absorption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_ClearOut_FortifyBuff.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_ClearOut_FortifyBuff.BaseDuration]}s</font> to all friendlies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_WarHammer.WarHammer_Spell_ClearOut_Fortify.Radius]}m</font>.

Clear Out's cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_ClearOut_CDRonHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> per enemy hit with the ability.

Using Clear Out on a target grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_ClearOut_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Slam your war hammer into the ground, causing a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_WarHammer.WarHammer_Spell_Shockwave.Radius]}m</font> radius earthquake that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_Shockwave.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stunning</font> all impacted targets for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Shockwave_Stun.BaseDuration]}s</font>. 

This ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your war hammer, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_Shockwave.TauntDuration]}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

The trauma of the attack causes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font>, decreasing the damage dealt from the target's attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Shockwave_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Shockwave_Weaken.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Expands the range Shockwave to a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_WarHammer.WarHammer_Spell_Shockwave_L2.Radius]}m</font> radius.

A powerful ground strike that erupts a linear wave of energy in front of the player, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Warhammer_Damage_PathOfDestiny.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage to all targets in its path.
Path of Destiny now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font> all targets in its path.

Ability cooldown reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_PathOfDestiny_CDRPerHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> for each enemy hit with Path of Destiny. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Upgrade_WarHammer_PathOfDestiny_CDRPerHit.NumberOfTrackedHits]} enemies.)</font>

Increase damage absorption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_ArmorNearbyEnemy.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> if surrounded by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> or more enemies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_WarHammer.WarHammer_ArmorPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]}m</font>.

DisplayName: I Can Do This All Day
Description: Reduce stamina consumption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_LessStaminaOnBlock.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}%</font> when blocking melee attacks.
Reduce damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Pass_SprintDmgReduction.ABSThrust * 100]}%</font> while sprinting.

Reduce war hammer cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_CDROnDebuffHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> when using light attacks against targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_CDROnDebuffHit.NumberOfTrackedHits]} reductions per attack.)</font>

After hitting a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Pass_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Pass_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_DmgToWHDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage against targets affected by war hammer <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heal</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[WarHammerAbilityTable.Passive_WarHammer_CrowdCrusher_HPOnCCHit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of damage dealt when using a Crowd Crusher ability.

After <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> light attacks with the war hammer, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> durations on player are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">25%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown 5s.)</font>

Whenever a target is affected by a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">crowd control effect</font>, they are slowed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.WarHammer_Ult_SlowOnCC.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
